label: yearly_production
description: Estimated annual energy production of the mini-grid (including excess)

label: renewable_share
description: Share of the energy production that is provided from renewable sources

label: firm_output
description: Indication of the rough magnitude of a constant load that could be powered by the mini-grid

label: total_investments
description: Sum of all capital expenditures

label: tariff
description: The estimated cost for the consumer, taking into account all capital and operational expenditures as well as financing costs over the project lifetime

label: project_lifetime
description: Number of years the project is intended to be operational

label: bm_name
description: The selected approach for the delivery of the mini-grid project. In this case, the business model refers to the determination of roles and responsibilities of project proponents in the fields of ownership, development and implementation, operation and maintenance and financing

label: exchange_rate
description: Price of the given currency in relation to USD

label: total_equity
description: The sum of equity that is provided, e.g. by a mini-grid company and/or community energy cooperative

label: total_grant
description: The sum of grant financing that flows into the project from funding agencies

label: initial_loan_amount
description: The sum of debt borrowed from banks and financiers at the beginning of the mini-grid project to cover investment costs

label: replacement_loan_amount
description: The sum of debt borrowed from banks and financiers during the lifetime of the mini-grid project to cover larger replacement costs of assets, such as inverters, battery or diesel generator

label: shs
description: Consumers assumed to be served by solar home systems instead of the mini-grid

label: households
description: Households connected to the mini-grid

label: enterprises
description: Enterprises connected to the mini-grid, including machinery

label: public
description: Public facilities connected to the mini-grid

label: installed_capacity
description: Already existing capacity of asset

label: optimized_capacity
description: Newly added capacity to satisfy demand

label: capex_initial
description: Total funds needed to buy the asset

label: fuel_costs_total
description: Fuel costs during the first year of operation

label: opex_total
description: Operational and maintenance costs during the first year of operation

label: ac_bus_excess_flow
description: Excess solar PV electricity that may be fed into the storage

label: dc_bus_excess_flow
description: Excess solar PV generation that is unused by the system

label: pv_plant_flow
description: Demand directly satisfied by the solar PV plant

label: battery_charge_flow
description: Battery charging from excess generation

label: battery_discharge_flow
description: Demand satisfied by the storage system

label: electricity_demand_flow
description: Total demand to be satisfied by the system

label: diesel_generator_flow
description: Demand satisfied by the diesel generator

label: with_grant
description: Financial parameters assuming the given grant share provided by REA or similar institutions

label: without_grant
description: Financial parameters assuming no grant

label: Cash flow after debt service
description: The remaining cash flow from operating activities after the interest and debt service payments

label: Debt repayments
description: The process of paying back a lender, typically through pre-determined periodic payments until the original amount borrowed and interest payments are repaid

label: Debt interest payments
description: A periodic fee for being lent the money

label: Operating revenues net
description: Revenues from operation after tax (VAT) payments. Operating revenues can include revenues from electricity sale, revenues from fees and revenues from excess power purchase

label: Operating expenses
description: Ongoing expenses for the operation of the mini-grid. These can include operation amd maintenance (O&M) costs of the PV system, management and bookkeeping, insurance, land lease, security on site, and diesel costs

label: Fix project costs
description: E.g. land purchase, planning and development costs

label: Insurances
description: Several uncontrollable risks may exist that can damage the mini-grid system and dimish revenues, such as extreme weather events, theft or technical defects. Against a periodical fee, insurances reimburse the mini-grid owner in such cases.

label: Labour and soft costs
description: E.g. the labour needed for the system installation, development expenditures (DEVEX), incl. feasibility studies, project management or any contingency costs

label: Logistics
description: Logistics include costs for shipping, customs clearance costs, costs for custom storage and local transport

label: Power supply system
description: Purchase cost of the mini-grid assets (PV plant, battery and diesel generator)

label: Taxes
description: The Value Added Tax (VAT) is a consumption tax paid when goods are purchased and services rendered. VAT applies to all operating revenues of the mini-grid system

label: Transmission network
description: Transmission network costs can include costs for the on-site transformer, the substation for grid connection and the grid-connection itself
